title: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
description: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even if the build is already done.
OB: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled.
EB: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should only be enabled when a build is required, i.e., when there are changes that need to be built.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Java perspective.
2. Right-click on a project or a file in the package explorer.
3. Observe that the "Build" action is always enabled, even if the build is already done.
